title: What happens after we die?
content: According to the Bible:The moment after you die, your soul temporarily departs from your body to await the Resurrection.Those who place their faith in Christ will be carried by the angels into the presence of the Lord. They are now comforted. Absent from the body and present with the Lord.

title: what happens after we die
content: On the other hand some people say:Death is a process, it is not a black and white moment, irreversible

title: what is realit mean for you reality?
